pages.text: Fa`budu Ma Shi'tum Min Dunihi Qul 'Inna Al-Khasirina Al-Ladhina Khasiru 'Anfusahum Wa 'Ahlihim Yawma Al-Qiyamati 'Ala Dhalika Huwa Al-Khusranu Al-Mubinu
Lahum Min Fawqihim Zulalun Mina An-Nari Wa Min Tahtihim Zulalun Dhalika Yukhawwifu Allahu Bihi `Ibadahu Ya `Ibadi Fa Attaquni
Wa Al-Ladhina Ajtanabu At-Taghuta 'An Ya`buduha Wa 'Anabu 'Ila Allahi Lahumu Al-Bushra Fabashir `Ibadi
Al-Ladhina Yastami`una Al-Qawla Fayattabi`una 'Ahsanahu 'Ula'ika Al-Ladhina Hadahumu Allahu Wa 'Ula'ika Hum 'Ulu Al-'Albabi
Afaman Haqqa `Alayhi Kalimatu Al-`Adhabi 'Afa'anta Tunqidhu Man Fi An-Nari
Lakini Al-Ladhina Attaqaw Rabbahum Lahum Ghurafun Min Fawqiha Ghurafun Mabniyatun Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Wa`da Allahi La Yukhlifu Allahu Al-Mi`ad

Alam Tara 'Anna Allaha 'Anzala Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Fasalakahu Yanabi`a Fi Al-'ArÄ‘i Thumma Yukhriju Bihi Zar`aan Mukhtalifaan 'Alwanuhu Thumma Yahiju Fatarahu Musfarraan Thumma Yaj`aluhu Hutamaan 'Inna Fi Dhalika Ladhikra Li'wli Al-'Albabi
